title: I can't seem to download pdf files from any of my apps. The only options I have are to share.
content:
I've been trying to download some bank statements from my banking app, which are in pdf files. I did have an Adobe app installed so I could view them, but that didn't seem to allow me to save/download the files. So, I uninstalled the app, in the hope that I would be able to download the files. Unfortunately, now I can only 'share' the files with other apps. I thought I might be able to download a file if I shared it with another app first, but the same happens when I attempt to download the file from that app.

Any ideas what is happening, and how to fix it?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
